DocumentMetaData.OfficialAlphaNumberHtml: <abbr title='Revised Statutes of Canada'>R.S.C.</abbr>, 1985, c. 25 (1st Supp.)
DocumentMetaData.longTitle: An Act respecting the import and export of and interprovincial trade in meat products, the registration of establishments, the inspection of animals and meat products in registered establishments and the standards for those establishments and for animals slaughtered and meat products prepared in those establishments
DocumentMetaData.longTitleHTML: An Act respecting the import and export of and interprovincial trade in meat products, the registration of establishments, the inspection of animals and meat products in registered establishments and the standards for those establishments and for animals slaughtered and meat products prepared in those establishments
